post.body: the first time i went out with my girl thats how much i dropped trying to look cool.
thats how much i spent on drinks when i first went out with my gf
Megan Fox. Wow. Wow. Just now seeing Transformers btw. Wow.
The only time im leaving the apartment is for greasy chinese. Merry xmas to me.
I've been obsessed with redheads lately.
Im gonna turn off my phone and wallow in my misery.
I don't think I've ever felt this lonely in my entire 22 years of existence.
http://tinyurl.com/9gupnp Am I a real blogger now????
Rock of Love girls > Real Chance girls. But I maybe biased.
Hot Spanish dancers? Muy Buenos Dias indeed!
I just saw Diane Lane holding a cow on an infomercial. I wanna fall asleep!
Sex and the City reruns suck without the woman who brought it into my life.
I have an iPhone, PSP, premier earbuds and a credit card. If i get robbed someones gonna have an awesome xmas.
Why are there so few cabs at 3 AM? Who rides the train then?
Does anyone know of any rappers that successfully changed names? My name officially changes in January and I'm paranoid.
I just took my first massive fall. Hi to you too winter.
Watching the history channel at 5:37 AM. Edison documentary. He sounds like a 19th century Kanye West.
Who knew a 60 dollar bar tab could bring 6 months of happiness???
Little ghetto kids are nasty as fuck. I hate my job!
Drinking a stella. Classy, I know.
